titles.title: A bill to amend the Contract Work Hours and Safety Standards Act and the Walsh-Healey Act to permit employees, to whom such Acts apply, to work any combination of hours in a forty-hour workweek.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.
Referred to Subcommittee on Labor Standards.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Contract Work Hours and Safety Standards Act and the Walsh-Healey Act to permit employees covered by such Acts to work any combination of hours in a 40-hour workweek.
